title: Design Blast Exclusion Zone
description: A drill and blast engineer determines the required exclusion zone for an upcoming blast to ensure the safety of all personnel and equipment.

tasks.description: Retrieve the design for the upcoming blast, including the location and total amount of explosives.
tasks.expected_outcome: The blast design parameters are retrieved.

tasks.description: Use a predictive model to estimate the potential flyrock distance and ground vibration levels.
tasks.expected_outcome: The model predicts a maximum flyrock distance of 400 meters.

tasks.description: Define a 500-meter exclusion zone around the blast pattern on the mine map and communicate it to all personnel.
tasks.expected_outcome: A safe exclusion zone is established and communicated to ensure no one is inside the zone during the blast.
